sense.def:
One's response to an event, action, or statement
je tisto, kar naredimo kot odziv na neki dogodek, dejanje ali trditev.

seg.quote: The Government's response to the riots was firm.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo ali rečemo
in response to an event, action, or statement
, se s tistim odzovemo na neki dogodek, dejanje ali trditev.

seg.quote: Will waved his hand in response.
